definition: Mozi (c. 470-391 BC), founder of the Mohist School 墨家[Mo4 jia1] of the Warring States Period (475-220 BC)
surname Mo/abbr. for 墨西哥[Mo4 xi1 ge1], Mexico
ink stick/China ink/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/corporal punishment consisting of tattooing characters on the victim's forehead
(noun suffix)

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Finally, law of the Mozi is "reverencing God and ghost" the god law.
sentences.chinese: 最后，墨子之法是“尊天事鬼”的神权法。

sentences.english: Theory of Mozi and theory of Qinhuali have nothing debatable.
sentences.chinese: 墨子及禽滑厘的学说并无争议。

sentences.english: Mozi was another teacher who was very influential.
sentences.chinese: 墨子是另一位极具影响力的思想家。

sentences.english: The third chapter is the part of the case studies of historical materials in MoZi.
sentences.chinese: 第三章为《墨子》中史料的个案研究部分。

sentences.english: Mozi is the collection of Moist writings of the Warring States Period.
sentences.chinese: 《墨子》是战国时期墨家著作的总集。

sentences.english: Generally thought that Mozi denied art, he did not say esthetically.
sentences.chinese: 一般认为墨子是否定艺术，不言审美的。

sentences.english: For their own considerations, Plato and Mozi do not respect art and artists.
sentences.chinese: 出于各自的理由，柏拉图和墨子不尊敬艺术和艺术家。

sentences.english: W It took Mo-tse three years to make a wooden kite which could fly.
sentences.chinese: 墨子费了三年功夫做成一只木鸢，使其能飞。

sentences.english: What are the ingredients used to make this Mozi biscuit?
sentences.chinese: 这个墨子酥是用什么原料做的呢？

sentences.english: Mozi founded the philosophy called Mohism.
Mozi founded the philosophy called Mohism.
Mozi has made certain contribution in studying on function word.
sentences.chinese: 墨子对虚词的研究做出了一定的贡献。

sentences.english: Other important thinkers included Mengzi and Mozi.
sentences.chinese: 其他的思想家另有孟子和墨子。

sentences.english: Mozis cultural ideology is a significant part of the outstanding Mohism.
sentences.chinese: 墨子的文化思想是先秦显学墨学的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: The sixth chapter is the reflection of Mo-tse's moral character.
sentences.chinese: 第六章是对墨子道德人格思想的反思。

sentences.english: The fourth chapter introduces the origin of Mo-tse's moral character.
sentences.chinese: 第四章介绍墨子道德人格思想的渊源。

definition: same as Zhuangzi 莊子|庄子 (369-286 BC), Daoist author
Lu Ban, legendary master craftsman, called the father of Chinese carpentry
original name of Mozi 墨子[Mo4 zi3]
Sun Bin (-316 BC), political strategist of the School of Diplomacy 縱橫家|纵横家[Zong4 heng2 jia1] during the Warring States Period (425-221 BC)
Ying Zheng (260-210 BC), personal name of the first emperor 秦始皇[Qin2 Shi3 huang2]
Han Xin (-196 BC), famous general of first Han emperor Liu Bang 劉邦|刘邦[Liu2 Bang1]
秦越人[Qin2 Yue4 ren2] (407-310 BC), Warring States physician known for his medical skills, nicknamed Bian Que after the earliest known Chinese physician allegedly from the 黃帝|黄帝[Huang2 di4] era
Bai Qi (-258 BC), famous general of Qin 秦國|秦国, the victor at 長平|长平 in 260 BC/same as 公孫起|公孙起
Nüwa (creator of humans in Chinese mythology)
Jing Ke (-227 BC), celebrated in verse and fiction as would-be assassin of King Ying Zheng of Qin 秦嬴政 (later the First Emperor 秦始皇)
Houyi, mythological Chinese archer whose wife was Chang'e
Han Feizi, book of Legalist Philosophy authored by Han Fei 韓非|韩非[Han2 Fei1] during the Warring States Period (475-220 BC)

Jiang Ziya (c. 1100 BC, dates of birth and death unknown), partly mythical sage advisor to King Wen of Zhou 周文王[Zhou1 Wen2 wang2] and purported author of “Six Secret Strategic Teachings” 六韜|六韬[Liu4 tao1], one of the Seven Military Classics of ancient China 武經七書|武经七书[Wu3 jing1 Qi1 shu1]
Li Bai (701-762), famous Tang Dynasty poet
"universal love", principle advocated by Mozi 墨子[Mo4 zi3], stressing that people should care for everyone equally

Zhuge Liang (181-234), military leader and prime minister of Shu Han 蜀漢|蜀汉 during the Three Kingdoms period/the main hero of the fictional Romance of Three Kingdoms 三國演義|三国演义, where he is portrayed as a sage and military genius/mastermind
